MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 7.54PM in the ST7 postcode area of Church Lawton following reports of a safety concern on our overhead line network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.59PM on 15th April 2021.
